products.title: LSD
products.shortdescription: 5x5 tabs sheet, OPTIONAL: customizable blotter paper
products.longdescription: LSD also known colloquially as acid, is a psychedelic drug. Effects typically include intensified thoughts, emotions, and sensory perception. At sufficiently high dosages LSD manifests primarily visual, as well as auditory, hallucinations.
